statements: SELECT * FROM provider_performance_metrics;
SELECT provider_name, quality_score FROM provider_performance_metrics WHERE provider_id = 1;
SELECT provider_id, provider_name, patient_satisfaction_score FROM provider_performance_metrics ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT provider_name, quality_score FROM provider_performance_metrics WHERE quality_score > 4.5;
SELECT DISTINCT provider_id, provider_name FROM provider_performance_metrics ORDER BY provider_id ASC;
SELECT provider_id, provider_name, quality_score, patient_satisfaction_score FROM provider_performance_metrics WHERE quality_score > 4.5 ORDER BY provider_name DESC
SELECT provider_name, quality_score, patient_satisfaction_score FROM provider_performance_metrics WHERE patient_satisfaction_score < 4.0 ORDER BY quality_score ASC, provider_name ASC
SELECT provider_name, quality_score FROM provider_performance_metrics WHERE quality_score BETWEEN 4.0 AND 4.5 ORDER BY quality_score DESC
SELECT provider_id, provider_name FROM provider_performance_metrics WHERE provider_name LIKE 'Dr%' ORDER BY provider_id ASC
SELECT * FROM provider_performance_metrics WHERE quality_score > 4.0 AND patient_satisfaction_score > 4.0 ORDER BY provider_id ASC
SELECT * FROM healthcare_providers;
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM healthcare_providers ORDER BY provider_name ASC;
SELECT provider_name, total_patients FROM healthcare_providers WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT provider_name, avg_patient_rating FROM healthcare_providers ORDER BY avg_patient_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM quality_improvement_metrics WHERE date_recorded >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM healthcare_providers ORDER BY provider_name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT provider_name, specialty, total_patients FROM healthcare_providers WHERE avg_patient_rating > 4.5 ORDER BY total_patients DESC;
SELECT provider_id, provider_name, specialty, total_patients, avg_patient_rating FROM healthcare_providers WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology' AND total_patients > 100 ORDER BY avg_patient_rating DESC;
SELECT provider_name, total_patients, avg_patient_rating FROM healthcare_providers WHERE specialty IS NOT NULL AND total_patients BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY total_patients ASC;

SELECT h.provider_name, q.metric_type, q.metric_value, q.date_recorded FROM healthcare_providers h JOIN quality_improvement_metrics q ON h.provider_id = q.provider_id WHERE q.metric_value > 0.8 ORDER BY q.date_recorded DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_providers;
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM healthcare_providers WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT provider_name, specialty, location FROM healthcare_providers ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM quality_metrics WHERE actual_value > 50;
SELECT note_id, note_text, timestamp FROM notes WHERE provider_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_providers WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM healthcare_providers ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM quality_metrics WHERE actual_value > target_value;
SELECT p.provider_name, q.metric_name FROM healthcare_providers p JOIN performance_improvement pi ON p.provider_id = pi.provider_id JOIN quality_metrics q ON pi.metric_id = q.metric_id;
SELECT n.note_text, n.timestamp, p.provider_name FROM notes n JOIN healthcare_providers p ON n.provider_id = p.provider_id WHERE n.timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Providers
SELECT provider_name, provider_specialty, provider_rating FROM Providers
SELECT provider_name, provider_location FROM Providers ORDER BY provider_rating DESC
SELECT provider_name, provider_specialty FROM Providers WHERE provider_rating > 4.5
SELECT * FROM Visits WHERE visit_type = 'Checkup'
SELECT * FROM Providers WHERE provider_rating > 4.5 ORDER BY provider_location DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT provider_name, provider_specialty, provider_rating FROM Providers WHERE provider_specialty = 'Cardiology' AND provider_location = 'New York'
SELECT provider_name, provider_specialty, provider_location, provider_rating FROM Providers JOIN Visits ON Providers.provider_id = Visits.provider_id WHERE Visits.visit_date = '2022-01-15'

SELECT provider_name, provider_specialty, provider_rating, patient_name, visit_date FROM Providers JOIN Visits ON Providers.provider_id = Visits.provider_id JOIN Patients ON Visits.patient_id = Patients.patient_id WHERE patient_condition = 'Hypertension'
SELECT DISTINCT provider_specialty FROM Providers WHERE provider_rating > 4 ORDER BY provider_specialty ASC
SELECT * FROM healthcare_providers;
SELECT provider_name, provider_specialty, provider_rating FROM healthcare_providers;
SELECT provider_name, provider_location FROM healthcare_providers WHERE provider_rating > 4.5;
SELECT * FROM patient_records ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT provider_name, provider_specialty, metric_name, metric_value FROM healthcare_providers INNER JOIN quality_metrics ON healthcare_providers.provider_id = quality_metrics.provider_id;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_providers WHERE provider_id = 1;
SELECT provider_id, provider_name, provider_specialty FROM healthcare_providers ORDER BY provider_specialty DESC;
SELECT provider_name, provider_location FROM healthcare_providers WHERE provider_rating > 4.5;

SELECT pr.record_id, pr.patient_id, hp.provider_name, pr.diagnosis FROM patient_records pr JOIN healthcare_providers hp ON pr.provider_id = hp.provider_id WHERE pr.record_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT qm.provider_id, qm.metric_name, ps.score_value FROM quality_metrics qm JOIN performance_scores ps ON qm.metric_id = ps.metric_id WHERE ps.score_value > 80 ORDER BY ps.score_value DESC;
